column5: Today was amazing. We got there at 9 am, and there was a line already! We Seen quite a few friendly faces from OFC. I give a HUGE hats off to Jp, Jim, Dave and Ryan! Lets not forget all the volunteers that ensured a TON of kids had a great day! I know my daughter had a great time! She met her fishing Hero again..Ill let the pics do the rest of the talking Thanks again to all responsible for this wonderful event! Here is a link to the total album, feel free to browse the photo's! Ill also attach some here on the board..  http://photobucket.com/factsfofishing         Hey dave nice repair job on the tail light!!! love it      Big Smile Ryan!           Thats all im going to post on here...for more go to my photobucket page I took well over 100 pictures. Enjoy!
Can't believe I didn't see you, glad you enjoyed the day.
I seen ya a couple times Dan...Lol you had kids around you so I didnt bother saying Hi...That was a zoo of youngsters thats for sure...

In one picture I think a few girls are daring Dave to eat a fish....I see his is thinking about it but he know he wont like it...in the next I see myself, kid and wife and know what I was doing at that time.....around noon for that picture....god pics thanks for posting.
Looks like everyone had an awesome time!
Well you were easy to find...  hanging around cute gals giving out the fishing gear...
We had a great time as well. My oldest was overjoyed when Dave spent some time fishing with her. Looking forward to next year. Would maybe like to volunteer. Anybody know who to contact?
